education.degree: Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Computer Science & Business (CSB)
education.courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Java Programming, Discrete Math, Statistics, Linear Algebra, Intro to Management

skills: Java, Python, TypeScript, C, C++, NodeJS, ReactJS, GraphQL, JavaScript, React Native, HTML, CSS, SQL, MongoDB, Git

experience.title: Append
content: Creating full stack universal contact sharing app with easy link sharing and fields for popular social media accounts.
Designing web and mobile apps using NextJS and React Native to use server-side rendering for user link previews.
Assembling API using Type GraphQL for smooth integration with TypeORM, interacting with PostgreSQL database.
Storing user-generated profile pictures on Google Cloud Storage buckets and AWS S3 for secure cloud storage.
Testing API resolvers and endpoints using Jest to ensure code is intact and operational with maximum efficiency.
Leveraging sessions, PassportJS with Google and Facebook OAuth, and Redis cache to create a secure user system.

experience.title: RANT
content: Produced full stack social media website where users can rant about any topic, publicly, privately, or anonymously.
Applied ReactJS hooks with TypeScript to create an efficient frontend cache and to speed up project development.
Optimized Firebase tools for file storage, authentication, and database for user, post, and notification operations.
Deployed NodeJS REST API on Google Cloud Functions to optimize cost with on-demand serverless hosting.

experience.title: Aglet
content: Constructed full stack sneaker wish-list website featuring ability to create, update, and delete sneaker listings.
Adapted Apollo client for ReactJS to create a single-page web app that could execute GraphQL API requests.
Built NodeJS GraphQL server with MongoDB storage for efficient queries and quick retrieval of sneaker data.
Implemented sorting entries by variables with algorithms such as radix and merge sort for enhanced performance.

experience.title: Relic Recovery Robotics Scouting Analytics App
content: Created Android data analytics app allowing users to leverage robotics match scores to produce a ranked list of the strongest teams to pick for alliance selections, with 140+ downloads and a 4.94-star rating on Google Play Store.
Utilized SQLite database to store match data and Java to process data and compile CSV file of ranked data.

leadership.title: Developer Student Club (DSC) Lead at Lehigh University
content: Initiating club as a product manager, teaching 50+ Lehigh students to develop apps helping local organizations.
Spearheading online events including presentations, meetings, and app creation workspaces for Lehigh students.

leadership.title: Co-Founder, President
content: Managing 501(c)(3) non-profit incubator fostering tech-entrepreneurs by consulting 13 businesses around the US.
Assisting 2 individuals with tactical web development, marketing plan creation, and pricing strategies to boost sales.

leadership.title: Mentor, Founding Captain, Two-Time Robotics World Champion
content: Individually mentoring 25+ students in 3+ reputable FIRST Robotics teams to design and build competitive robots.
Competed at World Championships Elimination matches for 6 years, winning the World Championships 2 times.
Organized 50+ outreach events to improve Oregon STEM and raised $15,000+ to fund other teams and non-profits.
